'''Cold Cut Platter''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Cold Cut Platter is obtainable by completing the domain [[Eagle's Gate]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 21.

Depending on the quality, Cold Cut Platter increases the party's {{Color|Physical DMG}} by '''20'''/'''30'''/'''40''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Fischl|Die Heilige Sinfonie}}
